lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: TheGreenTorment
lender.occupational_info: Its distinctive flavor and its rich history make it an obvious choice to inspire mixologists. We set out to create an authentic absinthe specifically designed for mixology.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I want to help everyone.

lender.name: Lew
lender.loan_because: My wife and I recently returned, October 2009, from a trip to Kenya and Tanzania. We loved Africa and the people we met. In Africa we saw hardworking people who were very appreciative of even a little help to improve their life. Through Kiva we're pleased to find a way to help aspiring individuals to grow and improve their business and home life.
lender.occupational_info: I worked 39 years for the states of Washington and Oregon. My work was primarily with children, their families, the elderly and care facilities for children, the aged and developmentally disabled adults.

lender.name: Timothy and Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: i love God

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I can give a little
lender.occupational_info: I do cancer research

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have had the opportunities I've been given, and would like to pass similar opportunities along to hardworking people who deserve them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates magazines and books, and I help distribute them through the internet.

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: JagadGuru
lender.occupational_info: Jagad Guru (Chris Butler) Siddhaswarupananda Paramahamsa is a highly respected yoga guru (teacher) coming in a long line of authentic spiritual masters, known as the Brahma Madhva Gaudiya Sampradaya , in the ancient Vedic tradition known as Vaishnavism.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Women should be able to affect their living conditions.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I believe in it. It's not that I have extra money sitting around that I don't need, but ultimately I believe that we are here to help one another. Also, it is surpising how $25 can "go" farther for these people in their countries than it does here for me!
lender.occupational_info: What I've worked with for 31 years is a very powerful hands-on healing work that has dramatically improved my life and made changes in thousands of others' lives. I'm passionate about doing and teaching it.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: improving someone else's life can also improve my own.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a civilian engineer for the US Navy.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people do something to make them happy
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their banking making deposits and giving them money from their bank accounts.

lender.name: ScienceofIdentity
lender.occupational_info: The Science of Identity Foundation was established by Jagad Guru Chris Butler in 1977 in order to pass on the ancient teachings of yoga in a scientific, logical, and clear manner

lender.name: Maps & Trinz
lender.loan_because: We can't say it better than it has already been said: 'Be the Change You Want to See in the World' - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: We work and travel, travel and work.

lender.name: Pangolin
lender.loan_because: I know that a little money, in the right hands, can make a positive impact.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others who have little access to world monetary systems succeed in business .
lender.occupational_info: I spend about half my time in entertainment and acting and musical performance activities and the other half dealing with business and tax matters in my other "role" as a CPA in USA.

lender.name: Twilight
lender.loan_because: We have to look out for our fellow brothers and sisters in this world and show them love. Love conquers all.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: To live simply and help others live well is the way of well being for everyone.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am starting a business myself and realise I am very fortunate to have access to funding. This is an effective way to give a hand up to someone with the same business aspirations and hopefully result in a successful and sustainable enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I study part-time, I work in an office part-time doing office admin (accounting etc) and I am the Sales & Marketing partner in a small business based in New Zealand.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to change/help the world in some ways. As tiny as it may be, I do my bits.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing research about corporate social responsibility. Assuming there are companies taking care of the society they operate in; the focus of my study is to investigate how these companies can communicate with their consumers.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much and I want to share His goodness with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to know God better through His Son, Jesus Christ, from the Bible.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I loan because, increasing commerce at a micro finance level is the most effective way of stimulating a developing economy. It bypasses the potentially corrupt and beaurocratic governments and does not suffer from the negative side effects of aid.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop websites.

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning money that is paid back to develop economic independence rather than giving money and developing dependence. I have traveled in Mexico, Africa and the Middle East and have seen how much thought and effort people are willing to put into developing their livelihoods under challenging conditions and how much more can be done if the opportunity is there.
lender.occupational_info: I am a biologist that studies the genetics of populations to learn how species evolve.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference at a local level.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who have ideas and want to change their situation by their own. Doing something is better than to be on welfare.
lender.occupational_info: I am travelling a lot in Germany and Austria, selling plastic products for labs. I love to be independent, taking the burden of working hard.

lender.name: Pascal Van Hecke
lender.occupation: Privacy expert, IT trainer, RubyOnRails developer
lender.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime"
[man = m/f, Chinese Proverb]
lender.occupational_info:
Note: the money I put into Kiva comes from advertising (some $10/mth) on pet project websites.
By doing this consistently for years, and use automatic relending (my input has been reused for up to 5 times) I' ve been able to contribute a little to many more people's lives than I ever thought possible - with what I considered pocket money.
Thank you, internet, for letting me do this.

lender.name: Amund
lender.loan_because: I use most of my money on useless things, I want to change that.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: "We can do no great things, only small things with great love." ~Mother Teresa

lender.name: Gowtham
lender.loan_because:
I believe that the advent of globalisation has hurt various domestic businesses such as sewing, and sustainable farming. Albeit the fact that globalisation has affected the entire world positively, it still has left these small scale industries suffer as they find it impossible to contend with foreign imports.
I feel that people who have the confidence and are willing to work hard, should be given a fair chance in the market - without affecting the market structure.
I would like to lend to these small scale industries and help them compete in a freer economic structure.
lender.occupational_info: Aeronautical Engineering Student

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Live love, don't just talk about it
lender.occupational_info: Private Investigator: I make sure people are trustworthy or stop them from breaking trust.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I help people, who speak different languages, communicate together.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance, and the joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I advise investment funds for a large bank by day, and write country songs when I can.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is an effective mechanism for economic development and the alleviation of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver professional services on tax reform and government policy issues for clients in Australia and the Asia Pacific. In my other (part-time) job I teach people how to ski in the Australian Alps.

lender.loan_because: Being a part of UBIEE has helped me to understand that when I have extra, to help others that need it.
lender.occupational_info: As the CEO of UBIEE Corp. S.L., I work with many others that want to help others, Help the Environment, work Towards a World Peace Solution and Help All Business's and Internet Marketer's Be Seen Online Easily for a Fair Price.

lender.loan_because: This is a great concept .

lender.occupational_info: I am a student, working on my bachelor's degree in literature. After I graduate, I plan to be a writer. In the meantime, I work as a pizza delivery driver.

lender.occupational_info: I make doors and windows.

lender.name: Purav

lender.name: ZPhiB - Lambda Zeta
lender.loan_because: We are an organization that is as equally concerned about the overall well being of our neighbors here at home, as well as our neighbors abroad in our native homeland.
lender.occupational_info: Zeta Phi Beta is a multi-ethnic sorority comprised of like minded women who share a passion for community service. We are adamant in our believe that our society's better days are ahead of us rather than behind us and change is primary our goal. Change for you, change for ourselves, and change for our world's joint future. Nation by nation, city by city, block by block, corner by corner, and heart by heart, we aim to change the world.

lender.name: Jonny
lender.loan_because: i believe the right people under the right circumstances can change the world if they are given the tools to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student from Los Angeles California and studying at Emory University in Atlanta. I am studying business, and am in my last year of study before i either enter the workforce, move on to law school, or join the peace corps

lender.name: Vinh
lender.whereabouts: Vung Tau Ba Ria- Vung Tau
lender.loan_because: I had to move to another place to live, so I can not keep my teaching. I want to lend some money to run an Internet store in Vung Tau, Vietnam. I have many knowledge on computer and I was also a technician for a small Internet store when I taught English in Angiang, Vietnam .
lender.occupational_info: I am 34 years old and I am married. I have 2 children. I have no picture now but I will upload it few days later. I want to manage a small store with about ten computers connecting the Internet. People will come there, hiring my computers to connect the Intenet or playing online games. The fee is about 3.000 VND for an hour for each person. I think I could pay the loan monthly. I wonder if I could lend about 1.500 $ and pay it in 36 months.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I can I want to I hope to help, someone somehow

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help make a difference.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: My favorite quote has always been, "Each man's life touches so many other lives," from the movie It's A Wonderful Life. I have been so fortunate to have the most wonderful family and friends who have helped me in times of need and have supported my every dream, and I wish to pass along their compassion.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young students, some whose first language is English and some whose first language is Spanish. I teach them reading, writing, math, science, social studies, and more! However, they are the ones who really teach me! They are the most genuinely wonderful human beings, and all of the students I have had throughout my three years as a teacher have inspired me beyond words with their innate altruism and enthusiasm for learning!

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: Life gave me so much already. I want to share it with others !

lender.name: Yewande
lender.loan_because: it could be me! Opportunity is a blessing - I am fortunate to be in a position where I can help others (with very little effort). Therefore, it is my responsibility to do so.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: Director at Synuron a social enterprise membership organisation, helping our members by looking at how people do things and how systems and structure can improve the way they work

lender.name: Outi

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: Antje

I also learned that it only takes a little bit more money to establish a solid source of income for themselves and their families. Those encounters inspired me to help out through Kiva.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Microcredit has the largest margin for social benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist by day and uhhh... a scientist by night too.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: its a social responsability
lender.occupational_info: Work in pro poor social policy design

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: of my Grandmother's example of Christian love and service. She touched many lives, including mine. In this way I can pay it forward.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: Because it can!
lender.occupational_info: I sell sigarettes and flowers in a supermarket

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: it's good.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to help understand why and where water flows in rivers.

lender.name: Brittania
lender.loan_because: its important to help others when you can. It is simply the right thing to do. I pray that eventually I am and we all are filled with compassion for others.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It's a kick ass way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money and work on growth projects for a school with a strong emphasis on understanding social concerns.

lender.name: paisley
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward and I want to give someone else the opportunity to accomplish their dreams and career goals. I am thankful to God and to everyone who has helped me in my career and I want to help someone else and inspire others to step up and do the same when they are ready.

lender.name: Alannah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I try to remember the world is much larger than the space I inhabit. I have been blessed with more than I deserve and I want to help others who deserve more than they have.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing & Communications Consultant - I create email and web based communications & resources for employees of a large corporation.

lender.name: Calandra
lender.loan_because: I like supporting people who work hard for themselves and their families. Especially Sustainable Urbanism!

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: LOVE

lender.name: Morgan
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in connecting with community leaders who are seeking expertise in the areas of sustainable growth and development with a particular interest in committing to building out, low carbon emission, approximately 10 acre school based village plans. www.greenschool.org

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: What all these guys are doing are genuine and require support from all of us no matter how small. I loan because it makes me feel human and connected.
lender.occupational_info: Financial and business adviiser mainly to government departments. I trained as an accountant.

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a leg up!
lender.occupational_info: I help women lawyers run their business.

lender.name: Marco & Gerry
lender.loan_because: We loan because we love to help people.
lender.occupational_info:
Marco - Manages a French Restaurant, he plans to one day open his own hospitality establishment to make use of his amazing business skills.
Gerry works for a Telco comapany managing the billing operations of accounts. In his spare time, he likes to read, write , cook & watch films.

lender.name: Deborah Mykkell
lender.loan_because: We simply need to help each other in order to make it a better for all.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager, Construction

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: It is time to stop being a passive witness to the adverse living condition of fellow mankind. I lend to those whom just a small contribution could make a lasting or pivotal difference in their living or social well-being.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: After two recent visits to Vietnam I wanted to support women to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: you must be the change you wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to!

lender.name: Konrad
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard working people. Through hard work anything is possible. I am an entrepreneur myself and love to support motivated, honest people.
lender.occupational_info: I work within information technology, primarily in the area of the Internet infrastructure, and application development.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are trying to make an honest living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with school children and people who struggle with something in their life, usually in their work or how they think about themselves.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: i like seeing people succeed at their business, i admire that and it is an inspiration to me
lender.occupational_info: i am a carpenter in new york city which means a lot of big buildings! my work has so much variety because it depends on the job what you need to do- for a skyscraper you could be doing anything from making the wooden forms that the concrete is poured into, or you could be the one seeing where the rooms go and building the metal framing and putting up sheetrock to finish the walls. or you could be working on a highway or bridge building that- really there is so much!
